description:
As the Head of Go-to-Market (GTM) strategy for Google’s Home and Nest business, you will be responsible for designing GTM strategy across the home hardware portfolio and managing its execution around the globe by supporting the Sales teams. You will be the primary interface with product leaders to develop a cohesive GTM strategy, including product positioning, launch plans, pricing, targets and key performance indicators (KPIs). You will also work closely with the Sales, Marketing, and Operations teams to execute on the established goals.

The Hardware Partnerships team was formed with the purpose of bringing the best of Google’s software and hardware to our users by bringing to market and distributing a Google-branded hardware portfolio. The team is responsible for managing all partnerships with carriers, retailers and resellers worldwide. This includes the partnerships for products such as Pixel, Daydream View, Google Wifi, Google Nest Thermostat, Chromecast Ultra and Google Home.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 10 years of experience in the mobile OEM or mobile carrier industry.
  • Experience in go-to-market, channel management, or sales functions, specifically working with mobile devices.
  • Experience with day-to-day sell-out management for hardware devices.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience executing complex strategic and operational initiatives on a global scale.
  • Experience managing and developing other individuals.
  • Management consulting experience in the consumer electronics space and or with retail/carrier channels.
  • Proven ability to plan and manage at both the strategic and operational level and to launch new products and/or programs successfully in the marketplace.
  • Excellent problem-solving and project management skills.
responsibilities:
• Manage overall home hardware business go-to-market activities to achieve targets within agreed upon metrics.
  • Own the execution of go-to-market strategy for portfolio by partnering closely with Product, Marketing, and Sales teams.
  • Work closely with regional Sales teams to define launch strategy and execution for Home and Nest products. Create and implement the governance model across the entire category business.
  • Analyze and determine key insights from key business drivers, trends, and operating metrics.
  • Lead quarterly business reviews with C-level stakeholders and be the expert on the portfolio’s performance, deliver key insights, and drive decision-making.
title: Head of Go-to-Market, Home and Nest, Hardware Partnerships
